verses.verse: And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H1696>Speak<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3588>If<s%> a <S%H5315>soul<s%> shall <S%H2398>sin<s%> through <S%H7684>ignorance<s%> against <S%H3605>any<s%> of the <S%H4687>commandments<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> concerning things <S%H834>which<s%> ought not to be <S%H6213>done,<s%> and shall <S%H6213>do<s%> against <S%H259>any<s%> of them:

<S%H518>If<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> that is <S%H4899>anointed<s%> do <S%H2398>sin<s%> according to the <S%H819>sin<s%> of the <S%H5971>people;<s%> then let him <S%H7126>bring<s%> for his <S%H2403>sin,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he has <S%H2398>sinned,<s%> a <S%H1121>young<s%> <S%H1241><s%> <S%H6499>bullock<s%> <S%H8549>without<s%> <S%H8549>blemish<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> for a <S%H2403>sin<s%> offering.

And he shall <S%H935>bring<s%> the <S%H6499>bullock<s%> to the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> and shall <S%H5564>lay<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> on the <S%H6499>bullock's<s%> <S%H7218>head,<s%> and <S%H7819>kill<s%> the <S%H6499>bullock<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> that is <S%H4899>anointed<s%> shall <S%H3947>take<s%> of the <S%H6499>bullock's<s%> <S%H1818>blood,<s%> and <S%H935>bring<s%> it to the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation:<s%>

And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H2881>dip<s%> his <S%H676>finger<s%> in the <S%H1818>blood,<s%> and <S%H5137>sprinkle<s%> of the <S%H1818>blood<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H6471>times<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H6532>veil<s%> of the <S%H6944>sanctuary.<s%>

And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H5414>put<s%> some of the <S%H1818>blood<s%> on the <S%H7161>horns<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of <S%H5561>sweet<s%> <S%H7004>incense<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is in the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation;<s%> and shall <S%H8210>pour<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of the <S%H6499>bullock<s%> <S%H413>at<s%> the <S%H3247>bottom<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of the <S%H5930>burnt<s%> offering, <S%H834>which<s%> is at the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation.<s%>

And he shall <S%H3318>take<s%> off from it <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2459>fat<s%> of the <S%H6499>bullock<s%> for the <S%H2403>sin<s%> offering; the <S%H2459>fat<s%> that <S%H3680>covers<s%> the <S%H7130>inwards,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2459>fat<s%> that is on the <S%H7130>inwards,<s%>

And the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3629>kidneys,<s%> and the <S%H2459>fat<s%> that is on them, <S%H834>which<s%> is by the <S%H3689>flanks,<s%> and the <S%H3508>lobe<s%> <S%H5921>above<s%> the <S%H3516>liver,<s%> with the <S%H3629>kidneys,<s%> it shall he <S%H5493>take<s%> away,

As it was <S%H7311>taken<s%> off from the <S%H7794>bullock<s%> of the <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> of <S%H8002>peace<s%> offerings: and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H6999>burn<s%> them on the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of the <S%H5930>burnt<s%> offering.

And the <S%H5785>skin<s%> of the <S%H6499>bullock,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H1320>flesh,<s%> with his <S%H7218>head,<s%> and with his <S%H3767>legs,<s%> and his <S%H7130>inwards,<s%> and his <S%H6569>dung,<s%>

Even the <S%H854>whole<s%> <S%H3605><s%> <S%H6499>bullock<s%> shall he <S%H3318>carry<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H2351>without<s%> the <S%H4264>camp<s%> to a <S%H2889>clean<s%> <S%H4725>place,<s%> <S%H413>where<s%> the <S%H1880>ashes<s%> are <S%H8211>poured<s%> out, and <S%H8313>burn<s%> him <S%H5921>on<s%> the <S%H6086>wood<s%> with <S%H784>fire:<s%> <S%H5921>where<s%> the <S%H1880>ashes<s%> are <S%H8211>poured<s%> out shall he be <S%H8313>burnt.<s%>

And <S%H518>if<s%> the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7686>sin<s%> through <S%H7686>ignorance,<s%> and the <S%H1697>thing<s%> be <S%H5956>hid<s%> from the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of the <S%H6951>assembly,<s%> and they have <S%H6213>done<s%> somewhat against <S%H259>any<s%> of the <S%H4687>commandments<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> concerning things <S%H834>which<s%> should not be <S%H6213>done,<s%> and are <S%H816>guilty;<s%>

When the <S%H2403>sin,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> they have <S%H2398>sinned<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> it, is <S%H3045>known,<s%> then the <S%H6951>congregation<s%> shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> a <S%H1121>young<s%> <S%H1241><s%> <S%H6499>bullock<s%> for the <S%H2403>sin,<s%> and <S%H935>bring<s%> him <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation.<s%>

And the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> shall <S%H5564>lay<s%> their <S%H3027>hands<s%> on the <S%H7218>head<s%> of the <S%H6499>bullock<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> and the <S%H6499>bullock<s%> shall be <S%H7819>killed<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> that is <S%H4899>anointed<s%> shall <S%H935>bring<s%> of the <S%H6499>bullock's<s%> <S%H1818>blood<s%> to the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation:<s%>

And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H2881>dip<s%> his <S%H676>finger<s%> in some of the <S%H1818>blood,<s%> and <S%H5137>sprinkle<s%> it <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H6471>times<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> even <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H6532>veil.<s%>

And he shall <S%H5414>put<s%> some of the <S%H1818>blood<s%> on the <S%H7161>horns<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> that is in the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation,<s%> and shall <S%H8210>pour<s%> out <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> <S%H413>at<s%> the <S%H3247>bottom<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of the <S%H5930>burnt<s%> offering, <S%H834>which<s%> is at the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation.<s%>
And he shall <S%H7311>take<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H2459>fat<s%> from him, and <S%H6999>burn<s%> it on the <S%H4196>altar.<s%>

And he shall <S%H6213>do<s%> with the <S%H6499>bullock<s%> as he <S%H6213>did<s%> with the <S%H6499>bullock<s%> for a <S%H2403>sin<s%> offering, <S%H3651>so<s%> shall he <S%H6213>do<s%> with this: and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall make an <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for them, and it shall be <S%H5545>forgiven<s%> them.

And he shall <S%H3318>carry<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> the <S%H6499>bullock<s%> <S%H2351>without<s%> the <S%H4264>camp,<s%> and <S%H8313>burn<s%> him as he <S%H8313>burned<s%> the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H6499>bullock:<s%> it is a <S%H2403>sin<s%> offering for the <S%H6951>congregation.<s%>

<S%H834>When<s%> a <S%H5387>ruler<s%> has <S%H2398>sinned,<s%> and <S%H6213>done<s%> somewhat through <S%H7684>ignorance<s%> against <S%H259>any<s%> of the <S%H4687>commandments<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> his <S%H430>God<s%> concerning things <S%H834>which<s%> should not be <S%H6213>done,<s%> and is <S%H816>guilty;<s%>

<S%H176>Or<s%> if his <S%H2403>sin,<s%> <S%H834>wherein<s%> he has <S%H2398>sinned,<s%> <S%H3045>come<s%> to his <S%H3045>knowledge;<s%> he shall <S%H935>bring<s%> his <S%H7133>offering,<s%> a <S%H8163>kid<s%> of the <S%H5795>goats,<s%> a <S%H2145>male<s%> <S%H8549>without<s%> <S%H8549>blemish:<s%>

And he shall <S%H5564>lay<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> on the <S%H7218>head<s%> of the <S%H8163>goat,<s%> and <S%H7819>kill<s%> it in the <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> they <S%H7819>kill<s%> the <S%H5930>burnt<s%> offering <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> it is a <S%H2403>sin<s%> offering.

And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H3947>take<s%> of the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of the <S%H2403>sin<s%> offering with his <S%H676>finger,<s%> and <S%H5414>put<s%> it on the <S%H7161>horns<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of <S%H5930>burnt<s%> offering, and shall <S%H8210>pour<s%> out his <S%H1818>blood<s%> <S%H413>at<s%> the <S%H3247>bottom<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of <S%H5930>burnt<s%> offering.

And he shall <S%H6999>burn<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H2459>fat<s%> on the <S%H4196>altar,<s%> as the <S%H2459>fat<s%> of the <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> of <S%H8002>peace<s%> offerings: and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall make an <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for him as concerning his <S%H2403>sin,<s%> and it shall be <S%H5545>forgiven<s%> him.

And <S%H518>if<s%> <S%H5315>any<s%> <S%H5315>one<s%> of the <S%H776>common<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H2398>sin<s%> through <S%H7684>ignorance,<s%> while he <S%H6213>does<s%> somewhat against <S%H259>any<s%> of the <S%H4687>commandments<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> concerning things <S%H834>which<s%> ought not to be <S%H6213>done,<s%> and be <S%H816>guilty;<s%>

<S%H176>Or<s%> <S%H176>if<s%> his <S%H2403>sin,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he has <S%H2398>sinned,<s%> <S%H3045>come<s%> to his <S%H3045>knowledge:<s%> then he shall <S%H935>bring<s%> his <S%H7133>offering,<s%> a <S%H8166>kid<s%> of the <S%H5795>goats,<s%> a <S%H5347>female<s%> <S%H8549>without<s%> <S%H8549>blemish,<s%> for his <S%H2403>sin<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he has <S%H2398>sinned.<s%>

And he shall <S%H5564>lay<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> on the <S%H7218>head<s%> of the <S%H2403>sin<s%> offering, and <S%H7819>slay<s%> the <S%H2403>sin<s%> offering in the <S%H4725>place<s%> of the <S%H5930>burnt<s%> offering.

And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H3947>take<s%> of the <S%H1818>blood<s%> thereof with his <S%H676>finger,<s%> and <S%H5414>put<s%> it on the <S%H7161>horns<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of <S%H5930>burnt<s%> offering, and shall <S%H8210>pour<s%> out <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> thereof <S%H413>at<s%> the <S%H3247>bottom<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar.<s%>

And he shall <S%H5493>take<s%> away <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2459>fat<s%> thereof, as the <S%H2459>fat<s%> is <S%H7311>taken<s%> away from off the <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> of <S%H8002>peace<s%> offerings; and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H6999>burn<s%> it on the <S%H4196>altar<s%> for a <S%H5207>sweet<s%> <S%H7381>smell<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall make an <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for him, and it shall be <S%H5545>forgiven<s%> him.

And <S%H518>if<s%> he <S%H935>bring<s%> a <S%H3532>lamb<s%> for a <S%H2403>sin<s%> <S%H7133>offering,<s%> he shall <S%H935>bring<s%> it a <S%H5347>female<s%> <S%H8549>without<s%> <S%H8549>blemish.<s%>

And he shall <S%H5564>lay<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> on the <S%H7218>head<s%> of the <S%H2403>sin<s%> offering, and <S%H7819>slay<s%> it for a <S%H2403>sin<s%> offering in the <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> they <S%H7819>kill<s%> the <S%H5930>burnt<s%> offering.

And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H3947>take<s%> of the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of the <S%H2403>sin<s%> offering with his <S%H676>finger,<s%> and <S%H5414>put<s%> it on the <S%H7161>horns<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of <S%H5930>burnt<s%> offering, and shall <S%H8210>pour<s%> out <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> thereof <S%H413>at<s%> the <S%H3247>bottom<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar:<s%>

And he shall <S%H5493>take<s%> away <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2459>fat<s%> thereof, as the <S%H2459>fat<s%> of the <S%H3775>lamb<s%> is <S%H7311>taken<s%> away from the <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> of the <S%H8002>peace<s%> offerings; and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H6999>burn<s%> them on the <S%H4196>altar,<s%> <S%H5921>according<s%> to the offerings made by fire to the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall make an <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for his <S%H2403>sin<s%> that he has <S%H2398>committed,<s%> and it shall be <S%H5545>forgiven<s%> him.
